virtual Model * CreateModel () const

Detailed Description

Editor for editing passwords in a line. All characters are shown as stars by default, or cleartext if cleartext mode is set to TRUE.

Model * PasswordEditor::CreateModel (   )  const [protected, virtual]
 

Factory method for creating a model. Must be implemented by every class, which needs it's own model. By default a component has no model and 0 is returned. If a model is dynamically created by 'new', it must be deleted in the destructor by e. g. delete GetModel();.

Returns:
Pointer to the model.

void PasswordEditor::SetClearTextModeEnabled (  BOOLEAN  cleartext  ) 
 

Sets the clear text mode. Per default cleartext mode is disabled, thus only asterisks are displayed.

Parameters:
cleartext sets the cleartext mode
